mapper.sql: u.ID, u.INT_ID,u.NAME,u.CITY_ID,u.COUNTRY_ID,u.BSC_NAME,u.BTS_ID,u.BTS_TYPE, u.COST_TYPE, u.MONEY, u.PROOF_FILE, u.REMARK, u.PAY_TIME, u.PAY_USER, u.IS_TIMEOUT, u.IN_TIME,u.IN_USER, u.MONTH_DEGREE, u.BASE_DEGREE, u.PAY_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
from WY_BTS_CHARGE_LIST where INT_ID=#{intId} and COST_TYPE=#{costType}
mapper.insert: insert into WY_BTS_CHARGE_LIST (ID, INT_ID,NAME,CITY_ID,COUNTRY_ID,BSC_NAME,BTS_ID, BTS_TYPE, COST_TYPE, MONEY, PROOF_FILE, REMARK, PAY_TIME, PAY_USER, IS_TIMEOUT, IN_TIME,IN_USER, MONTH_DEGREE, BASE_DEGREE, PAY_TYPE) values (WY_BTS_CHARGE_LIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{btsName},#{cityId},#{countryId},#{bscName},#{btsId}, #{btsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proofFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{payUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthDegree,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baseDegree,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update:
update WY_BTS_CHARGE_LIST
INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME=#{btsName},
BSC_NAME=#{bscName},
BTS_ID=#{btsId},
CITY_ID=#{cityId},
COUNTRY_ID=#{countryId}
BTS_TYPE = #{btsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COST_TYPE = #{costType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROOF_FILE = #{proofFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=DATE},
PAY_USER = #{payUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TIMEOUT = #{isTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_TIME = #{inTime,jdbcType=DATE},
IN_USER=#{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
MONTH_DEGREE = #{monthDegree,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BASE_DEGREE = #{baseDegree,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
